infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: OneMore uses your location to show nearby events and calculate distances.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: OneMore needs access to your photo library to let you upload event images.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: OneMore needs access to your camera to let you take photos for events.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: Allow OneMore to send you notifications about event updates, messages from organizers, and new events from favorite organizers.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: OneMore needs access to your calendar to save events you want to attend.
